name: Arsalan Makhajankar
title: Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
summary: MERN Stack & Next.js developer experienced in full‑stack apps, REST APIs, and microservices. Skilled in React, Node, Express, MongoDB, Java, Python, and SQL; adept at scalable solutions and backend integration.

highlights: Developed and configured a Spring Boot backend using Java, Maven, and H2 to simulate financial transaction systems.
Integrated Apache Kafka for event-driven messaging, improving modularity and responsiveness.
Designed and consumed RESTful APIs with secure microservice communication.
Applied SDLC best practices across stages of project development.
Built and deployed MERN stack applications integrating React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
Developed REST APIs with CRUD operations and NoSQL database integration for scalable storage.
Implemented responsive UI designs using Next.js ensuring cross-browser and cross-platform compatibility.
Collaborated in Agile workflows using Git/GitHub for version control and team reviews.
Designed and deployed full-stack applications using React.js, Node.js, and Express.js with focus on user-friendly interfaces.
Optimized application performance and ensured cross-platform compatibility.
Managed contributions and peer code reviews using Git/GitHub in team-based Agile projects.

projects.name: AiCruiter – AI Voice Recruiter
highlights: Built a Next.js full-stack application with Vapi Voice AI, reducing manual screening efforts by 60%.
Integrated Supabase authentication and database storage to manage 1,000+ candidate profiles.
Designed scalable recruitment workflows for large candidate datasets.

projects.name: AI Therapist Fine-Tuning Framework
highlights: Developed a custom LLM fine-tuning framework on psychology datasets, improving empathetic accuracy by 30%+.
Integrated Hugging Face APIs with a Next.js web UI, tested on 15+ devices.

education.institution: Gharda Institute of Technology, Khed, India
S.D. Gadre Junior College, Chiplun, India

awards: Oracle Database Foundations Associate – Certificate of Recognition (Mar 2025)
Team Lead – Hack Celestials, Pillai College of Engineering (Sep 2024)
Next.js: Creating and Hosting a Full-Stack Site – LinkedIn Learning (Jan 2025)
